post.author: 구게시판

comment.author: Vibrating alarm clock
comment.content: I just added this weblog to my rss reader, excellent stuff. Cannot get enough!

post.content:
[김승엽 wrote]
먼저 안됐다는 말씀부터 드려야 겠군요  
TORONTO STAR WEB SITE로 가 보시면 도움이 되지 않으까 싶군요
주소는 www.thestar.com        
career에 가 보시면 많은 job이 있습니다
도움이 됐으면 합니다  



Hungry Koreakim !!! wrote:

>I live in Peterborough, Ontario 1 hour 30 minutes drive from Toronto.  Since i lost my job, I have been looking for a I.T job for 6 months.  Not only I am still UNEMPLOYED, but also run out of MONEY !!!  Now I am so discouraged and almost give up.  
>
>I am a Microsoft Certified System Engineer(MCSE). But without practical experiences , I found out it's hard to find a job.  If anyone has any advice or information Please let me know.
>
>Sincerely,
>
>
>
post.title: [re] [2000/4/12] Information or advice for job searching (김승엽)
